text: The 2019–20 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team represents Drexel University during the 2019–20 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Dragons, led by fourth-year head coach Zach Spiker, play their home games at the Daskalakis Athletic Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania as members of the Colonial Athletic Association. ==Previous season== The Dragons finished the 2018–19 season 13–19, 7–11 in CAA play to finish in a tie for 6th place.
